weekly_top_story.headline: NIH funding cuts during Trump administration disrupted over 380 clinical trials affecting 74,000 participants
weekly_top_story.summary: New research published in JAMA Internal Medicine reveals that funding cuts from late February through August 2025 disrupted 383 NIH-funded clinical trials, threatening research pipelines and raising ethical concerns for patient trust.

stories.headline: Medicare telehealth flexibilities restored after government shutdown, enabling wider access to remote care
stories.summary: Following the end of the government shutdown, Medicare and Medicaid telehealth flexibilities including audio-only visits and hospital-at-home programs were reinstated, improving access and reducing wait times for hospice, mental health, and chronic care patients.

stories.headline: Senate Finance Committee holds hearing on rising healthcare costs amid debates on premium subsidy extension
stories.summary: Congressional leaders are preparing for a floor vote on extending enhanced ACA premium subsidies as Senate hearings spotlight rising healthcare costs, with partisan divides making the future of subsidies uncertain for millions of Americans.
